Santa_Monica.\u00c1nimo Venice Charter High School:
Ánimo Venice Charter High School is a public charter school in Venice, Los Angeles which originally opened in 2004. Its mascot is a pirate, and it is operated by Green Dot Public Schools.


== History ==
Due in part to the success of Animo Leadership Charter High School, Ánimo Venice Charter High School was established as the fifth Green Dot school.
